name: Duck trip
description: Duck Trip is a 3D Hide and seek game based on a true story occurred in Chido Museum. You play as a duck that was found in a Japanese museum and kept there for 30 years, as time goes by the Duck came to life and began exploring the world around it, this is where you take control of the duck and find a way out of the Museum in order to find the original owner. Controls: Movement with Arrows and WASD, space to Jump, or controller (Thumb-sticks to move around and B to jump and A to interact)
